column12: PA  Friends and family may call on Monday
column14: 2015 from 2:00 - 4:00 and 6:00 - 8:00 p.m. at the Borland Funeral Home
column15: Inc. in Leeper. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Tuesday
column17: at St. Mary Catholic Church in Crown with Rev. Christopher Barnes
column19: as celebrant. Interment will follow in the church cemetery. Military Honors will be conducted by American Legion Post 66.
